meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Meredith Robinson Fidelito Cortes Sarah Zucker Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6676.

td.p: Meredith Robinson, a retired Naval officer from Gales Ferry, Connecticut
Fidelito Cortes, a writer from Port Jefferson Station, New York
Sarah Zucker, an Internet entrepreneur and screenwriter from Los Angeles, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $1,799)

tr.td: ASSUME THE PREPOSITION
WHERE IS IT?
REJECTED SPORTS TEAM NAMES
OSCAR-NOMINATED WARNER BROS. CARTOONS
FRAGRANCES
